content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experience, but the amount of time one should spend in Møre og Romsdal to see all the top tourist sites depends on the number of sites one intends to see and their interests. It is recommended to plan at least a week to visit the popular attractions, including the Geirangerfjord, Trollstigen, Ålesund, Runde Island, and the Atlanterhavsveien (Atlantic Road). However, if one wants to explore the region more thoroughly and do outdoor activities like hiking and skiing, it is advisable to spend two weeks or more.
